title: FS:  T206 Frank Chance (Red Port.) & Rube Waddell (Throwing)
author: SetBuilder

posts.post_title: FS:  T206 Frank Chance (Red Port.) & Rube Waddell (Throwing)
posts.post_content:
For sale are two PSA graded 2's.  A Chance red portrait and a Waddell throwing pose.  

The Chance looks great except for a minor crease running through the middle 50/50.  

The Waddell is coated in what looks like glue front and back (more on the back than on the front).   

Prices include shipping.  Buyer pays PayPal fees.  
Chance - SOLD!
Waddell - SOLD!

See images.

$100 for the Chance Red Portrait. 

No takers? :confused:
